modules:

p[q].r := i if q := ["a", "b", "c"][i]

package test

p.a.r := 0

cases.note: refheads/general, overlapping rule, different dynamic depths, no conflict
modules:
package test

p[q].r.s := i if q := ["a", "b", "c"][i]

p.d.r := 3

p.e := 4

package test

p[q].r.s := i if q := ["a", "b", "c", "b"][i]

package test

p[q].r.s := i if q := ["a", "b", "c"][i]

p.a.r := 42

cases.note: refheads/general, overlapping rule, deep override inside other rule object value, conflict
refheads/general, overlapping rule, deep injection into other rule object value, conflict

modules:
package test

p[q] contains r if {
	x := ["a", "b", "c"]
	q := x[_]
	r := x[_]
	q != r
}

p.b contains "foo"

result.description: true if `x` is not equal to `y`; false otherwise
result.name: result
